    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(Vector3D eye,
      Vector3D center,
      Vector3D up,
      float angle,
      float near,
      float far)
        Creates a new Camera with the eye arguments
        Parameters:
        eye - the position of the camera
        center - the position wherever the camera looks
        up - the orientation of the camera
        angle - the angle of view in degrees
        near - the near value of depth of field
        far - the far value of depth of field

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(long gameTime)
        Updates the camera with a delta time
        Parameters:
        gameTime - the elapsed time since last update

      • isRectangleVisible

        public boolean isRectangleVisible(Rectangle rectangle)
        Returns true if the rectangle is visible to the camera
        Parameters:
        rectangle - the rectangle has to be checked

      • isSpriteVisible

        public boolean isSpriteVisible(Sprite sprite)
        Returns true if the sprite is visible to the camera
        Parameters:
        sprite - the sprite has to be checked

      • convertScreenToWorldCoordinates

        public Vector2D convertScreenToWorldCoordinates(float x,
                                       float y)
        Returns the screen coordinates in world coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
